Comment: We are still an ungodly huge market, even with the coming recession, so people will come back to sell to us.  You are right about not being able to start and stop at our convenience, though. Even if Trump blinks again, we are going to see a lot of shortages in the short term.  West Coast ports have reported a 35-45% drop in shipping from China in the coming weeks. Places like Temu have raised prices significantly and more is coming.  Trade will come back to us, but it isn't going to happen first thing tomorrow should Trump blink.
